forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 11C.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with rain, windy. Lows overnight in the low 50s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
